name: PayPal Holdings, Inc.
description: PayPal Holdings, Inc. is a leading technology platform and digital payments company that enables consumers and merchants to make secure and seamless financial transactions. Founded in December 1998 and headquartered in San Jose, California, PayPal has revolutionized the way people conduct online financial transactions. The company's platform allows users to send, receive, and manage their money online, making it an essential tool for e-commerce and digital payments. PayPal offers a variety of services, including personal payment solutions, business solutions, and a robust mobile application that enhances the user experience. With its global reach, PayPal operates in over 200 markets worldwide, supporting more than 25 currencies. The company is committed to enhancing financial inclusion and has invested in various initiatives to help underserved communities access financial services. PayPal also owns several well-known brands, including Venmo, Braintree, and PayPal Credit, further expanding its footprint in the digital payment landscape. As the world shifts towards a cashless society, PayPal continues to innovate, focusing on security, technology integration, and user-friendly solutions to meet the evolving needs of consumers and businesses alike.

seo.meta_title: PayPal Holdings, Inc. | Digital Payments and Financial Technology
seo.meta_description: Explore PayPal Holdings, Inc., a leader in digital payments and financial technology. Discover innovative solutions for consumers and businesses globally.

faq.question: What services does PayPal offer?
faq.answer: PayPal offers digital payment solutions for consumers and businesses, including sending, receiving, and managing money online.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of PayPal?
faq.answer: Dan Schulman is the CEO of PayPal Holdings, Inc.

faq.question: Where is PayPal headquartered?
faq.answer: PayPal is headquartered in San Jose, California, USA.

faq.question: What are the main products of PayPal?
faq.answer: PayPal's main products include PayPal, Venmo, Braintree, and PayPal Credit.
